task.prompt: When Herman’s team is busy working on large projects he stops at the drive-through 5 days, every week to buy a breakfast combo for himself and 3 members of his team.  Each meal costs $4.00.  This current project will last 16 weeks.  How much will Herman spend on breakfast?
